message.description: Summary message of the ingestion process

total_iocs.description: Number of IOCs processed in this page

files_created.description: Number of CSV lookup files created or updated

upload_results.description: Results of file uploads to NGSIEM

job_id.description: Unique identifier for the ingestion job

meta.description: Metadata from the Anomali API response

next.description: Continuation token for workflow pagination (returned when more data is available)

modified_ts_gt.description: The modified timestamp greater than boundary used in this query (for workflow time constraint preservation)

modified_ts_lt.description: The modified timestamp less than boundary used in this query (for workflow time constraint preservation)

description: Response schema for Anomali ThreatStream IOC ingestion results with support for workflow-level pagination.
